name: Blocky Bois
description:
This game is a game I made using courses from Udemy and lots of determination (and the face of my best bro Wes Martin, check out his YouTube channel of the same name) I spent maybe a few weeks on this game so the quality as a game probably isn't the best. Still I put my soul into it and I would appreciate any and all feedback.

Cheers!

- William Thrun
